first_para: Gregory Leonard George "Greg" Barker (born 8 March 1966) is a British Conservative Party politician. In May 2010 he was appointed Minister of State for Energy and Climate Change.

full.extract: Gregory Leonard George "Greg" Barker (born 8 March 1966) is a British Conservative Party politician. In May 2010 he was appointed Minister of State for Energy and Climate Change.
full.title: Gregory Barker
